official-title.#text: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for additional coverage options for beneficiaries under the original Medicare fee-for-service program through a Medicare Link program.

The required care management services shall include clinical interventions to help coordinate care.
Prevention and wellness.
Transitional and case management and other clinical programs.
Chronic disease management.
Advanced illness care initiatives.
Diabetes prevention programs.
Transitional case management, for individuals discharged from a hospital or other health care institution.
Nurse practitioner-led interventions (consistent with restrictions under applicable State law).
Post-acute transition programs.
High-risk case management.
Home-based primary care.
Advanced illness transitional care.
Operation of clinical management programs.
Management and development of provider networks.
Consumer engagement with decision support.

The predictive modeling and risk prioritization services described in this paragraph shall include the following:
The use of claims data and trend data to predict which enrollees could benefit from the application of a clinical intervention or which might be high risk and in need of a care plan.
